title: Hospital-Physician Practice Mergers Drive Some Price Increases: Study (Healthcare Financial Management Association)
text: ( Source : Healthcare Financial Management Association ) The findings could spawn additional Medicare site-neutral payment cuts, according to one payment expert. Oct. 22-Hospital and physician practice integration was associated with increases
